content:
What a coincidence! I'm thrilled to hear that you participated in the "Run Disney" 5K event at Disneyland on October 8th! That must have been an incredible experience, running through the park before it opened to the public.

I can only imagine the excitement and energy of running through the iconic Disneyland streets, surrounded by Disney music, characters, and decorations. It's amazing that you got to experience the park in a unique way, and I'm sure the memories will last a lifetime.

How was the course route? Did you have a favorite part of the run, or was there a particular character or landmark that stood out to you? I'm all ears!

By the way, did you happen to notice any special Disney touches or surprises along the course? Run Disney events are known for their attention to detail and hidden gems, so I'm curious to know if you stumbled upon anything magical during your run.
